title: Banned without a reason.
body:
So i was playing with a couple friends a couple days ago, and my client crashed upon finishing a game. I try to log in and it says my account is suspended for 2 days, doesnt show any chatlogs or anything, and when i checked my email, ALL it says is i have been suspended for "violating the rules" with no explanation as to what.
So i put in a support ticket to riot asking what exactly i did that was deserving of a ban? because i really dont have a clue why i would be. Its been 2 days, with no answer from riot, and they also changed the ban from a 2 day to a 2 week, with stll no information as to why.
What is going on?

replies.body: Chances are it had nothing to do with you crashing, unless you have been constantly disconnecting/leaving.

well sometimes it takes a few days to get  response ... i mean they have to go through all the other support tickets get to yours go back and research and review the data that relates to you and your ban and then come up with a reply

be patient ....

your ban will be over soon...

Then ask! Riot is the Plaintiff and you are the Defendant the Benefit of Doupt is on your side while on theirs is the Onus Probandi. Use the f@cking advantages you are philosophically given.

Even if you deserve something is it too much to ask for it?

How much would it cost for you to reply:

Please Riot bring forth the Chat Logs.

The first step in getting something or showing the public you deserve it is asking for it!

Why did you put in a ticket... WHY DID YOU DO THAT. You were one of the lucky ones that got their ban wrong with a double first tier 1 day ban instead of a second tier 14 day ban... You brought this onto yourself.

If you ask about a ban then you will get it reviewed, it could make it worse. You got banned and Riot is authoritarian so in 96% of the cases it wont get reverted. 

You are almost cute thinking that Riot doesn't have the pan by the handle and that they care for the less than 1% of the playerbase that got banned.
lmao you are beyond help, goodluck getting a perma
